# The interwar economy

+ [P.K. O’Brien, ‘Britain’s Economy between the Wars’ *Past and Present* (1987)](https://www.jstor.org/stable/pdf/650841.pdf?refreqid=excelsior%3A09ec919b161a551579b8a4e816489098){target="_blank"}
